column2:
§Y[From.GetTitledName]§! is a powerful vassal in §Y[Root.GetName]§!. This faction is a representation of [From.GetHerHis] influence in the realm! [From.GetSheHeCap] will set goals and recruit rulers to help [From.GetHerHim] achieve these goals.

Focus: [From.lmmpvf_GetFactionFocus]
Goal: [From.lmmpvf_GetFactionGoal]
